task_details.title: Vulnerability Baseline Documentation
remediation_actions: Ran pnpm audit to get current vulnerability data
Updated vulnerability-baseline.json with accurate scan results (was showing 0 vulnerabilities, now correctly shows 4)
Added detailed vulnerability information: esbuild (moderate), lodash-es (moderate), lodash (moderate), diff (low)
Added CVSS scores, CVE references, and remediation plans for all vulnerabilities
Updated attestation file with current scan results
Verified all vulnerabilities are in dev dependencies only (no production impact)

definition_of_done_verification.criterion: Baseline documented with zero critical/high vulnerabilities

summary.message: Task EXP-ARTIFACTS-003 has been remediated and is now COMPLETE
summary.root_cause_resolved: vulnerability-baseline.json was outdated (showing 0 vulnerabilities), now updated with accurate scan data (4 vulnerabilities)
summary.validation_confirmed: pnpm audit executed, KPIs verified (zero critical/high), all vulnerabilities documented with remediation plans
